description.en: A Community of Creative Workers. Discuss exciting topics such as programming, design, hardware, games, and more.
description.nl: Een gemeenschap van creatieve werkers. Bespreek spannende onderwerpen zoals programmeren, ontwerp, hardware en games.
description.zh_CN: 创意工作者的社区。讨论编程、设计、硬件、游戏等令人激动的话题。
description.zh_TW: 創意工作者的社區。討論編程、設計、硬件、遊戲等令人激動的話題。
description.ga_IE: Pobal Oibrithe Cruthaitheacha. Pléigh ábhair spreagúla mar ríomhchlárú, dearadh, crua-earraí, cluichí agus go leor eile.
